name: RE Member
description:
You've awoken to find that you can't remember anything, not even your own name. Can you piece your life back together in time to restore your memories? Explore your apartment to solve the mystery of your amnesia and figure out the truth. To play: Use your mouse to interact with/ pick up objects by clicking on them. Use the inventory button to check what items you currently have.
Fullscreen is recommended for the best experience!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Art, programming, writing, and game design by Feral Poodles (Alexis Krasnoff) Music used: Ludum Dare 30 - Track 6 by TallBeard Studios 

Created with Unity for the I Can't Write Jam here on Itch. Thanks for hosting a great jam, Charlmes! :)

This is my second ever game made in Unity! It was a lot of effort, but I'm really proud of what I made, and I learned so much! I can't to take a break now, haha. I hope you enjoy the game! :)
